pages.text: An $(item)Explorer Map$() is a special $(item)Map$() used to aid in finding rare generated structures, including $(l:world/structures#mansion)$(thing)Woodland Mansions$(), $(l:world/structures#monument)$(thing)Ocean Monuments$(), and $(l:world/structures#treasure)$(thing)Buried Treasures$(). $(br2)These maps can be traded from a $(l:creatures/human-villager#cartographer)$(thing)Cartographer Villager$() or found in $(l:world/structures#ruin)$(thing)Ocean Ruins$() or $(l:world/structures#shipwreck)$(thing)Shipwrecks$().
